definitions: to go out or make something go out in a curved shape
to increase or make something increase in number or size
to be filled with a strong emotion
the movement of the sea when it rises and falls without the waves breaking
the curved shape of something, especially a part of the body
a situation in which something increases in size, number, strength, etc.
a slow steady increase in the volume of something
very good, a lot of fun, etc.
